channel.title: How to make the ::command command
channel.description: like when people press ::commands they get the list of the commands we have and tell me where to put it in my folders plz

item.title: How to make the ::command command
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Or you can always just do thisâ€¦But you wont have it on your ::help, Especialy 4 pimpscape

Add this under Client.Java

Search 4 "army"

if(command.startsWith("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) { menuMaker("@blu@commands", "commands"); }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 08:05:58 PM[/size][hr]You should get no trouble at all, unless u suck that bad at coding

Read full topic

item.title: How to make the ::command command
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

wow brendan if u were here a little longer you would know that command tutorials are kind forbidden heres how you would do it, go to your clinet.java and search for

slayerhelp

right above where it says public void SlayerHelpMenu()

add this

[code]public void commands()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@Title", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8147);
                sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8148);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8150);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8151);
			        sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8152);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8153);
					sendQuest("@dbl@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8154);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8155);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8156);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE(wildy part)@dbl@", 8157);
					sendQuest("@dbl@TYPE HERE", 8160); 
							
                               	sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8161);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8162);
				 sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8163);
                               	sendQuest("@dbl@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8164);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HEREl@dbl@", 8165);
				 sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HEREslayer@dbl@", 8166);
                               	sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8167);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8168);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8169);
				 sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8170);
                               	sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8171);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@TYPE HERE@dbl@", 8172);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
	
			}[/code]

now search for

"help

right under where it says

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) { MainHelpMenu();

add this

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { commands();

Read full topic
